headline: Is Mondelez International (MDLZ) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Mondelez International is attractively priced right now, it helps to step back and look at what the recent share performance and valuation checks are signalling. The stock closed at US$52.73, with returns of a 3.8% decline over the last week, a 4.0% decline over the last month, a 1.7% decline year to date and a 6.7% decline over the last year. The 3-year return is a 15.1% decline and the 5-year return is 4.3%. Recent coverage has continued to focus on Mondelez as...
